title: permanently banned bs
body:
reason i got banned
"Game 1
DeLaSmexy: %%%%% U AINT THE CARRY
DeLaSmexy: burh its an ap supp
DeLaSmexy: its a gg
DeLaSmexy: gg
DeLaSmexy: all i heard was play with out a supp and int
DeLaSmexy: see
/all DeLaSmexy: lol fun game
DeLaSmexy: yall down to ff in 5 mins?
DeLaSmexy: told you i dont have a supp
DeLaSmexy: naw she does thats why she aint typing
DeLaSmexy: 0-10 bot its been over dummy
/all DeLaSmexy: thats how its been
/all DeLaSmexy: gg
DeLaSmexy: worst part is i called this in champ, i aint even being toxic just saying the truth
(all i said was their champs were pogs and this game is going to be annoying af. thats it.)
DeLaSmexy: i said it in champ therefore someone else dodges
(i play to play, knowing they have a higher chance of winning due to counters and just bs dmg burst. nothing else was said just about the line up, dodgeing wasnt mentioned till in game)
DeLaSmexy: not my fault the supp thinks shes a carry
/all DeLaSmexy: they mad in (im) shout casting
/all DeLaSmexy: all peace not toxic
/all DeLaSmexy: kai sa how good is an adc without a supp?
/all DeLaSmexy: and at lvl 2 when sona thought she did dmg so she went for the kill over being a supp
(this the play where bot truly had no chance XD)
DeLaSmexy: mute me kid its in the game (a fact)
DeLaSmexy: not new to this kind of bs
DeLaSmexy: seems like we are the same too me
DeLaSmexy: gg ez"
as you can see ive been banned for zero reason, now i want to either get unbanned or my $566.00 back, or an rp gift card plus the bonus rp for buying rp right of the LOL shop (All my rp exact). or im suing. if you can get banned for being a shout caster while also being untoxic then we are tacking this to court riot. by the way saying "gg" as in "good game" is unsportsmanlike? %%%%%= nibble as in the supp taking small bites of my farm as if i cant last hit. look at me asking if they wanna ff or keep fighting cuz id rather not waste a vote till the time comes. 0-10 was me and my "support" sona. and if yall truly see toxic in this chat then show me. i see a man using the chat system aliened to the rules (m-rated game graves has a cigar) then show me cuz i said "fun game" none the less even when we lose i still show i had fun, and saying gg showing i acknowledge the other teams skills even if they were pogs. last of all why is there a mute system if no one in the game uses it? and btw im gonna win this sue. ( any use of smoking is automatically upholds the rating of the game, so no riot your game(s) are not rated T.
the word that is %%%%%= (and are you ready) is
N
I
B
B
A. meaning nibbler, dont worry i got screen shots and everything. banning me for a made up league lingo is dumb

replies.body:
Go ahead, contact your lawyer.
Then show him the ToU you agreed to before you downloaded this game. Watch him laugh at you so hard and ignore you for wasting his time.

This punishment, however... IS SO WELL DESERVED.
Riot won't be showing up in court because they already won.
we will see.

>as you can see ive been banned for zero reason,

Oh, really?  Let's count the reasons...

>DeLaSmexy: %%%%% U AINT THE CARRY

Reason 1:  Racism.  The N word is considered part of the zero tolerance policy that Riot has implemented.  

>DeLaSmexy: its a gg
>DeLaSmexy: gg

Reason 2:  Negative attitude, giving up that early in the game doesn't help your team, nor does that attitude.  

>DeLaSmexy: 0-10 bot its been over dummy

Reason 3:  Insulting your teammates.  

>DeLaSmexy: worst part is i called this in champ, i aint even being toxic just saying the truth
>DeLaSmexy: i said it in champ therefore someone else dodges

Reason 4:  Admitting your negative attitude even before the game started.  I guess this could really be in Reason 2, but I view this is a seperate, but equally actionable offense.  

>DeLaSmexy: gg ez"

Reason 5:  Unsportsmanlike remark... I always report for this.  

**Conclusion:**  Ban deserved.  

**Advised Course of Action:** Leave and never come back.  

**Humorous Bonus:**

>now i want to either get unbanned or my $566.00 back or im suing. if you can get banned for being a shout caster while also being untoxic then we are tacking to to court riot. GG

Have fun with your baseless lawsuit.  You won't actually sue, no one on the Boards ever does, but I wish you would, I can't wait for you to lose.  

Buh-bye!

i dont see the n word, and if you do then i now i see the racist (a nibbler is someone who nibbles, ie a rat, a supp whos taking my last hits), spelling matters. and im a realist call it how you see it when you know you are 4 aint no that 10 going out with same when their team had 4 pogs, you can just tell whos winning and whos losing, pogs are real, and they are really annoying to play against. i was adc and my "supp" was 0-5 with me atm ( not duo'd random sona who thinks she can carry) and i can win the sue. trust.

> [{quoted}](name=DeLaSmexy,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jl1cXswk,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-04-24T05:39:57.479+0000)
>
> i dont see the n word

First line of your reform card that I quoted.  It is censored, the word "nibbler" would not be censored, we know what you said there.  That word, in and of itself, was enough to earn you a ban, the rest was just icing on the cake.  I get it, you think you're clever, but we have seen thousands of these threads before, you're not fooling anyone.

i only put gg for good game, i wouldnt replaces the b's in nibbler witch riot is saying i am saying, they are force feeding words to my typing, just cuz the word exist doesnt mean it used, in any witch way. the only one fooling anyone is your own dirty racist mind. a, n i b b a. is something that trash supports do when they want your gold, but it just dont apply to supps, say a jungler ganked got the kill and started feening on your gold for no reason. the greed. and yes i am clever cuz all you really see is someone typing with in the rules

plus tell me how many times have you told yourself "gg" knowing theres zero chance or a comeback cuz a lead is a lead i dont see people blowing that lead diving and throwing the enemy some gold. and last remember gg means "GOOD GAME" i aint the one throwing "BG" to the wind when the team gets my "gg's" it show i acknowledge their skills whatever you see unsportsmanlike must be in another twisted world cuz a good game is still a good game even if my team was more in the wood division.

> [{quoted}](name=DeLaSmexy,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jl1cXswk,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2018-04-24T06:46:13.904+0000)
>
> plus tell me how many times have you told yourself "gg" knowing theres zero chance or a comeback cuz a lead is a lead i dont see people blowing that lead diving and throwing the enemy some gold. and last remember gg means "GOOD GAME" i aint the one throwing "BG" to the wind when the team gets my "gg's" it show i acknowledge their skills whatever you see unsportsmanlike must be in another twisted world cuz a good game is still a good game even if my team was more in the wood division.

Huge difference between saying something to yourself and being a toxic asshole to your teammates.  Luckily you'll have some time to consider this issue.

I like it when people get banned for abusing their teammates and trying to tell them how to play, especially when it is trash ADCs who cant handle a support being better than them. Support gets a little easier with each one removed.

>  my $566.00 back or im suing.

Lolno.

You signed a legally binding agreement that forfeits all rights to a refund, and that you do not own any of the digital items you purchase from riot.

Not to mention it would cost way more than 500$ to take this to court, where you would probably be taken out with the trash.
1v1 mirror pick. also pls show me the agreements ion think anyone has read thos

> [{quoted}](name=DeLaSmexy,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jl1cXswk,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-04-24T05:44:56.754+0000)
>
> 1v1 mirror pick. also pls show me the agreements ion think anyone has read thos

And how many people have read every law that exists in their country? Not knowing laws/rules does not excuse from following them. It is your responsibility to know what you are allowed and what not allowed to do. Riot gave you all tools you need to know that.

getting banned for zero reason and having a company completely take your money is a rip off, having a "commUNITY" were people chose to go at each others throats over playing the game. now i only report inters cuz thats just boring and a waste of time( i dont int me and my supp have the same kd for a reason(the enemy bot lane plus help from jungler was just overall godly) ive had toxic teams every game since i started rank, and i mean every game, there isnt a single game were toxicness isnt leaked, cuz thats just what this game does to people, (mostly the lack of balance but hey thats all riot) if the ping system was improved and chat was taken out think how much people would stop getting their sissy feelings hurt, not one time have i "killed my self" due to many(many) people throwing it in chat, and not one time have i reported them cuz its a game and i can move on with my life knowing theres always another team in another match. and this kind of chat is allowed since in the game there is killing, and game is rated M (graves has a cigar)Smoking is 18 up in NA) so either the rating changes or there needs to be better terms and conditions. my overall point is grow a pair. verbal abuse on this game isnt real, there is a mute button learn to use it.
Please let us know the court date so we can show up to watch
root for me zpoop' man

"I'm not toxic, just telling the truth", that is not a valid argument. If someone goes 0/5 in 5 mean that does mean they play bad, but calling them bad is still a toxic behaviour.

You agree or don't, does not matter. Also, as mentioned before, if you are that toxic in a second game after your 14 days ban, it is entirely your fault.

they did always say the truth hurts, guess some take it right down to the soul, cant believe every lil thing  eat at yall, i dont even read chat i just put in the 2 cents they was lacking to keep it 1hunnit

> [{quoted}](name=DeLaSmexy,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jl1cXswk,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2018-04-24T06:39:38.710+0000)
>
> they did always say the truth hurts, guess some take it right down to the soul, cant believe every lil thing  eat at yall, i dont even read chat i just put in the 2 cents they was lacking to keep it 1hunnit

Interesting, but it doesn't matter what you consider toxic. What Riot considers toxic does. It's their game, you knew what you signed up for, if you didn't, your fault.

Simple as that.
i think this should have been a temp ban not a perma. I've said and seen more toxic stuff than this

> [{quoted}](name=ultraraza,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jl1cXswk,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-04-24T04:25:44.070+0000)
>
> i think this should have been a temp ban not a perma. I've said and seen more toxic stuff than this

Permabans aren't just for the most severe offenders, they are also for frequent offenders who show Riot that they have no intention of changing their behavior. Punishments are given in an escalating fashion, with each offense earning you the next harshest punishment. The last punishment before a permaban is a 14 day ban, which the OP has received and only just got off of it today. They have only played 2 games since their 14 day ban ended, and they are already back to unacceptable behavior (especially with the hate speech), so I'd say this does deserve a permaban.
where is the hate? i see a nibbler, someone who nibbles as in taking small bits at one another or my supp taking small bits of gold from me thinking i cant last hit

> [{quoted}](name=DeLaSmexy,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jl1cXswk,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2018-04-24T05:41:42.748+0000)
>
> where is the hate? i see a nibbler, someone who nibbles as in taking small bits at one another

 This right here.
> DeLaSmexy: %%%%% U AINT THE CARRY

Anything that is censored on the boards is most likely some form of hate speech, which is Riot has zero tolerance for. Now, while I don't know exactly what it is (though I can take a guess), don't try to lie and say it is nibbler. We can clearly see that the word only has 5 letters, so we know it cannot be nibbler, as that has 7 letters.
not my fault riot cant spell, and what you are referring to isnt what i spelled therefor prove me wrong. {{summoner:14}}

Since it is censored, I don't know what you spelled, so I can only guess. What I do know, though, is that the boards only censor extremely offensive words, mainly hate speech.

Now, while I may not 100% know exactly what is spelled there, I do know it is not nibbler. If you don't want to go by the number of letters, fine. How about we go by the fact that the word nibbler has not been censored in anyone's comments, and yet the word in your chat logs is. The chat logs you receive in the League client are not censored at all, so anything that is censored when you copy/paste the chat logs here is what the boards censor. Since we know that the boards do not censor the word "nibbler," we can then conclude that the censored word in your chat logs is not nibbler.

So, like I said don't try to lie by saying that censored word is nibbler. We know that it's not.

i spelled, and are u ready?
N 
I
B
B
A
witch what ever YOUR imagination puts it to is all on you, it means a summoner who takes your farm/gold. taking lil nibbles at your gold, witch is what my support sona was doing.

Okay, now we are getting somewhere. At no point before this did you say that you spelled it like that, which is why when you said the censored word was nibbler, I was left to assume you were saying you spelled the full word, not just a slang version.

With that aside, I have literally never seen anyone use this word before, however doing a little google search, I can see that n-i-b-b-a is used _all across the internet_ as an alternative spelling for the real racial slur, specifically designed to get around censors. I don't know why you used this as slang for nibbler, but it obviously didn't work. I mean, there is absolutely no context in your chat logs that pointed to you meaning to call him a nibbler instead of the n-word, so can you at least see where others, including Riot, would misinterpret what you say you meant?

Oh, and on a side note:

> banning me for a made up league lingo is dumb

Like I said before, the word you used is used in many places across the internet as a replacement for the n-word so people don't get censored or possibly banned from whatever site they are using, so this is definitely not "made up league lingo."

Let's take it a step further and pretend he should simply get a 10-game chat restrict. Getting one after another one means you're getting a 25-game chat restrict. Getting one after he got a 14 day ban means he's getting perma'd.

3 guesses at what he got off of.

> [{quoted}](name=ultraraza,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jl1cXswk,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-04-24T04:25:44.070+0000)
>
> i think this should have been a temp ban not a perma. I've said and seen more toxic stuff than this

and it happens thats what an unbalanced game does to people, bs come and nerfs it is the aura of the game.
Please sue them. I would love to see what happens.
When you didn't learned anything at all after finishing your 14 days suspension **5 days ago**...{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

all ive learned is that cod has the same amount of violence and not one person has been banned from the game with pure rage and racism in their voice chats and people dont give a hoot cuz its just a game, witch also has a mute system. this games leans towards "teens" while all the pro players are adults plus twitch streamers are older people with more m-rated behavior, if T1 can get unbanned then ive never shoulda been banned on bs.

Different games have different policy severity, you are not to compare on how both games fare their punishments. You literally just finished your 14 days suspension a few days ago, and you refused to reform even a simple bit.

Also, you actually have 0 clue on Tyler1's case at all to be mentioning him here. Please do more research before mentioning his name.
you sound hypo, yes ive been toxic, thats done. but what you arent seeing is there is no toxicness in this chat(.)
I’m a lawyer, and you’re an imbecile if you think you have any sort of winnable case.
must have lose a lot of cases. gg
